title: Can the Alarm Clock Be Snoozed? How  Can I Snooze It?
answer: When the alarm clock rings, you can press the left soft key or the end key to stop it, or press any other keys (except the left soft key and the end key) to snooze it for five minutes (the time can be set by users). The alarm clock can be snoozed for 10 times before it automatically stops.
